description:
11.168 monochrome
Convert video to gray using custom color filter.

A description of the accepted options follows.
name: monochrome

parameters.description: Set the chroma blue spot. Allowed range is from -1 to 1. Default value is 0.
parameters.name: cb

parameters.description: Set the chroma red spot. Allowed range is from -1 to 1. Default value is 0.
parameters.name: cr

parameters.description: Set the color filter size. Allowed range is from .1 to 10. Default value is 1.
parameters.name: size

parameters.description: Set the highlights strength. Allowed range is from 0 to 1. Default value is 0.
parameters.name: high

source:
11.168 monochrome

Convert video to gray using custom color filter.

A description of the accepted options follows.

cb

Set the chroma blue spot. Allowed range is from -1 to 1. Default value is 0.

cr

Set the chroma red spot. Allowed range is from -1 to 1. Default value is 0.

size

Set the color filter size. Allowed range is from .1 to 10. Default value is 1.

high

Set the highlights strength. Allowed range is from 0 to 1. Default value is 0.
